name: The Black Vade
description:
You assume the role of Rosa, a Cleric ordained to serve a cruel deity. Initiates and the fear stricken refer to this entity as Goddess. She creates mortals only to torment them with endless adventures.

Can you escape her omnipotent wrath?

Who is it that whispers to your mind and promises liberation?

What is the mystery of the Godlight Crystal?

This is a micro lite-RPG featuring:

  • Two to three hours of immersive, Retro Gameplay.
  • Introductory game to The Black Vade series of Video Games.
  • A classic, linear Lite-RPG story-line.
  • Elegant use of the original RTP.
  • Music from the RPG Maker DS resource pack.
  • The birth of the "Quest Lite-RPG" genre.
  • Featuring 4 characters with unique personalities.

Buy, Download and Enjoy!
